ygData.subject: Re: Simple Shin Shindig
ygData.msgSnippet: I did see the Lord being pulled by the Assasin group... Ok, they where all lvl 50 and getting mask for guildmember, but still... ... -- Benoit St-Hilaire
ygData.messageBody:
I did see the Lord being pulled by the Assasin group... Ok, they where all lvl 50 and getting mask for
guildmember, but still...

jhenders@... wrote:

> From: jhenders@...
>
> On Sat, Dec 11/99, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...> wrote:
> > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> > nice, ghoul lord at zone. never seen that before.
> >
>
> Totally amazing. Just trying to think how you could possible pull that
> off. The only way I could think to manage it would be to be bound on the
> lower side by the zone line and gate out of a fight with him. At that
> point the teleport code might kick in and he'd teleport to you. Hmm.
>
> The only other way I could see this would be someone with a ton of hp
> and sow, and even then I couldn't see them making it all the way to the
> zone unless the rest of the dungeon was picked clean.

--
Benoit St-Hilaire
bsthilai@...

My sister married a German. He complained he couldn't get a
good bagel back home. I said: ``Well, whose fault is that?''

Emo Philips
